item.title: ⚠️ Statuses

item.title: 🎯 Create Custom Dashboards
item.description: Custom dashboards with dataview The Dataview plugin for [📇 Terms/🪨 Obsidian/🪨 Obsidian] allows for the creation of 3 basic types of view using a SQL-like language, as well as JavaScript functions too.

item.title: 🏭 Project Stucture
item.description: Projects all the way down Inside Projects, use it as a normal folder stucture to organise your content - each project can represent something like a website, book, or other project where you need to collect data.

item.title: 🔌 Plugins & 🌈 Theme
item.description: %% Status:: #done %% Tags:: #theme #plugins #obsidian #customising #community Theme Currently the [Obsidian Garden] uses an unmodified version of Pisum - a dark mode theme for [Obsidian].
